{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-3782 |revision=A1 |series=AC1200 |asin=B00PVDM9H8;GB;,B00PVDM9H8;IT; |est_release_date=07/28/2016 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7511T |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, JP1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7592N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=xDSL Line Driver (LD);MediaTek;MT7555;;1; |flags=VDSL2,ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Dual-Band VDSL/ADSL Modem Router}} :[http://www.dlink.com/xk/sq/home-solutions/connect/broadband-modems-and-routers/dsl-3782-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-vdsl-adsl-modem-router Product page]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.lamelaelettronica.it/recensione-d-link-dsl-3782-modem-router/ Reviewed on '''LaMelaElettronica''']
The device is using a: *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7511T (1549-BMTH CTP43X97) *Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12835FM2I-10G 16MB *RAM: [[Winbond]] W9751G6KB-25 (DDR2-800) 64MB *WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7592N / MT7612EN (2T2R) *USB: 1x USB 2.0, TRF: 1608-BMAL Signal Transformer
===See also=== *[[MTN MT-WVD1202AC]] - Wireless VDSL2/ADSL2+ • [http://en.mtncn.com/product/optical/Wireless_VDSL2_Routers/20170317/134.html PPage] :● Chipset: [[EcoNet]] EN7511T / EN7555N (xDSL) :● Interface: 1x GbE WAN, 4x FE LAN, 1x USB2.0 :● WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7592N / MT7612EN (2T2R) *[[MTN MT-WVD302N]] - Wireless VDSL2/ADSL2+ • [http://en.mtncn.com/product/optical/Wireless_VDSL2_Routers/20170317/136.html PPage] :● Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7512 / MT7556 (xDSL) :● Interface: 1x GbE WAN, 4x FE LAN, 1x USB2.0 :● WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7592N (2T2R 802.11bgn) *[[Cabsat VDM14F1-W]] - Wireless VDSL Router • [http://www.cabsat.com.cn/pdetails98 PPage] :● Chipset: [[EcoNet]] EN7512U(B) / EN7556N (xDSL) :● Interface: 1x GbE WAN, 4x FE LAN, 1x USB2.0 :● WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7592N (2T2R 802.11bgn) *[[Cabsat VDB14F1-W]] - Wireless VDSL Router • [http://www.cabsat.com.cn/pdetails98 PPage] :● Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM63381U / BCM6303 (xDSL) :● Interface: 1x GbE WAN, 4x FE LAN, 1x USB2.0 :● WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn) :● ETH PHY: [[Broadcom]] B50212 (GbE WAN port)
